value.0: May the blessings of Earthmother Chantea, and the Treefather Silvanus be upon you, in these dark times.
Walk with balance and with nature.
Ask what you will.

LinkComment.value:
Intelligence greater than 8

Set <CUSTOM> token to the person he is currently talking to.

value.0: Many people are falling to plague, but animals suffer as well. They suffer in cages, in a Blacklake district lodge. There is a zoo in Neverwinter.
It is operated by a hunter and his "noble" entourage. It is not clean, it is not compassionate, and it is not right. The animals within are mistreated.
Your attitude is the majority. I was working to have it closed, but the plague has delayed that indefinitely. The officials I spoke with are hidden inside Blacklake.
It is not new. I was working to have it closed, but the plague has delayed that indefinitely. The officials I spoke with have barricaded themselves in Blacklake.
It has given the zoo a reprieve. They know the law was turning against them, but now they have time to cover their actions. With the blockade, even I cannot enter.
I fear the animals will simply be killed and made into trophies. I ask you to put a stop to this hunter by whatever means necessary, and I will gladly compensate you for your help.
I understand your reluctance in this troublesome time, but these little things make a difference too. Please, find it in your heart to reconsider.
I was hoping you would say that. A word of caution, however - my animal spies report that he has entourage of armed guards at his side, so be prepared for a fight. Good luck.
They claim they want common people to see the beauty of nature but, in truth, only the families of certain nobles are allowed in.
There are humane ways to do such things, but I suspect this zoo is more intended to show their superiority over the creatures held there.
For all the care they give to the animals held within, they may as well have simply placed their heads on the walls.
Montgomery "Sureshot" Weatherson. His family has been a great advocate of animal rights, but Montgomery abandoned that philosophy when his father died.
He gauges his progress as a man by what he has mastered, his family and business, and nature, creature by creature. He is out of balance.
Several nobles live vicariously through him. Their influence protects him from what little pressure I have been able to apply thorugh the law.
I know. Truth be told, my animal spies have kept me informed. I have felt it necessary to carefully monitor the situation.

A pity about the deaths among their captors. All life deserves a chance... but perhaps that was their chance. In any case, here is your reward: some gold and a magic ring that may help you be attuned with animals. Be with nature, my friend.
I can do that for you. But please, choose carefully in the future. Which animal companion would you like to switch to?
